column2: ODP Corporation is a provider of business services, products and digital workplace technology solutions to small, medium and enterprise businesses. The Company is operating through its direct and indirect subsidiaries, maintains a fully integrated business-to-business (B2B) distribution platform of approximately 1,300 stores and online presence. The Company offers its solutions under the brands Office Depot, OfficeMax, CompuCom and Grand&Toy. The Company offers its customers the tools and resources they need to focus to start growing and to run their business.
